nodes.text: A location monitor was a visual aid device that informed a being of their current whereabouts. They contained holographic display maps, which revealed a three-dimensional outline of whatever was input into the location monitor's computer. Tetan aristocrats Aleema and Satal Keto accessed a location monitor during their visit to the galactic capital world of Coruscant, in order to find the Museum of Dark Side Antiquities.
In the comic version of The Freedon Nadd Uprising, the Ketos locate the Museum they are searching for through the use of a guide book. The location monitor is not used nor displayed.
